1. Load packages and read in data
```{r, include = FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

hp_data <- read_csv("harry_potter_aggression_full.csv")

```


I'm in lab week 6, woo!


2. Basic Wrangling and make a graph of Harry and Draco's aggression rates
```{r}

hp_graph <- hp_data %>% 
  filter(Name == "Harry" | Name == "Draco Malfoy") %>% 
  select(Name, book, agg.per.mention ) %>% 
  
  #create a clustered column graph
  ggplot(aes(x = book, y = agg.per.mention)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = Name), position = "dodge") +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_bw()


hp_graph

```
